tips.title: Tips for best results:
items: Use direct links to recipe pages, not search results or category pages
Popular recipe websites work best (AllRecipes, Food Network, etc.)
Processing may take 15-30 seconds depending on the website
Some websites may require multiple attempts due to rate limiting

tips.title: Tips for best results:
items: Ensure text is clearly visible and well-lit

Supports Hebrew and English text recognition
